reused_details.reused: On Friday, Russian President Vladimir Putin said his nation is eyeing a cut to crude oil production in response to the Group of Seven Nations (G7) price cap on Russian crude, Bloomberg reported Friday.
reused_by_aic: Russia , the world's biggest exporter of energy, may cut oil production and will refuse to sell oil to any country which imposes the West's price cap on Russian oil, President Vladimir Putin  said on Friday.

reused_details.reused: The G7, which includes the U.S. and Australia, imposed a $60 per barrel price cap on seaborne Russian oil on Dec. 5 to target Moscows oil revenues which are helping fund its invasion of Ukraine.
